cards.title: Allergic to Commitment
cards.body:
Calls it "going with the flow".
Panics at the word "plans."

cards.title: Lives for Drama
cards.body:
Needs a plot twist every week.
Will manufacture one if bored.

cards.title: Brunch Maximalist
cards.body:
Will order everything and "share".
Actually takes the best bites.

cards.title: Weekend Disappears
cards.body:
Goes off-grid every Friday.
Returns with a new hobby.

cards.title: Chronically Late
cards.body:
Time is a suggestion.
Arrives when the vibe is right.

cards.title: Too Honest
cards.body:
Will review the date out loud.
Offers bullet points.

cards.title: Soft Launch Specialist
cards.body:
Keeps things ambiguous for months.
Loves a mysterious caption.

cards.title: Sleep Talker
cards.body:
Spills secrets at 2 a.m.
Has receipts.

cards.title: Dog-First
cards.body:
The dog chooses the date.
You are auditioning.

cards.title: Overachiever
cards.body:
Optimizes romance spreadsheets.
Has a KPI for feelings.

cards.title: Phone Minimalist
cards.body:
Texting is a chore.
Replies only to voice notes.
